record.title: John Doe, Douglas County, 2017
Background and immigration story
record.transcript:

Peter Venkman: That's awesome. Okay, I have more questions. What sort of skills and experience did your family bring with you when you came here?

John Doe: It was in Northern Greece, that was in Northern Greece, yes.
